mapper.select: select zpp.id,zpp.product_id productId,zpp.basic_price basicPrice,zpp.unit_price unitPrice,zpp.unit_price_min unitPriceMin, zpp.unit_price_max unitPriceMax,zpp.area_range_min areaRangeMin,zpp.area_range_max areaRangeMax,zpp.creator, zpp.created,zpp.modified,zpp.modifier,zpp.deleted from zh_product_price zpp where zpp.deleted =0 and zpp.product_id = #{productId}
